name: Galactic Wars (Aafaq Rana)
description:
Galactic Wars is a 2D-Shooter game and it contains some of the following features:

1) The player have to play multiple levels in space as well as on planet.

2) There is a slight changes in UI canvas and camera settings

3) Story board in start of every stage

4) Added a survival mode in which enemies will spawn infinitely

5) Made a custom main menu screen

6) A boss level in the end that indicates that you have saved the galaxy from alien invasion

Credits:

Created by Hafiz Muhammad Aafaq
